DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare radiological behavior of blocks of macroporous phosphocalcium as bone substitute in comparison with iliac crest autograft in tibial valgus osteotomy.
DOC.brief_title: Autograft Versus Calcium Phosphate Macroporous Bioceramics as Bone Substitute for Tibial Valgus Osteotomy
DOC.criteria: knee osteoarthritis eligible for tibial valgus osteotomy > 18 y.o prior tibial osteotomy history of local infection rheumatoid and other inflammatory arthritis
